name: Artisan
headline: AI Employees Called Artisans, Starting With An AI BDR
description:
At Artisan, we're creating AI Employees, called Artisans, and software which is beautiful, easy to use, and replaces the endless stack of point solutions.

We're starting with outbound sales. Our platform contains every tool needed for outbound sales - B2B data, AI email sequences, deliverability optimization tools and so much more. 

Ava, our AI BDR, operates within our platform. She automates:
- Lead discovery with access to over 300M B2B contacts
- Lead research, with 10s of data sources
- Choosing a sales strategy and writing + sending hyper-personalized emails
- Managing deliverability with a suite of tools - from email warmup to placement tests

We're on a mission to create the final boss of software, with every SaaS product needed for sales and AI employees consolidated together in one exceptional platform. 

This is the next Industrial Revolution.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:automation; industry:ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jaspar Carmichael-Jack, Founder
founders.description: Consolidating and automating software, starting with outbound sales.

## Powered by AI Employees

The Future is Consolidated
## We‚Äôre Building the Future of Software, 
## With AI Employees Called Artisans
We're not just building an outbound sales tool. We're replacing, optimizing, and automating the entire GTM stack with AI and world-class software products.
We're creating a world where Artisans will work alongside humans to automate the majority of their work.
# Ava,
# The Sales Artisan
![Ava](https://artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Fava%2Fleft.webp&w=640&q=100)
![Ava](https://artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Fava%2Fava.webp&w=750&q=100)
![Ava](https://artisan.co/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fhome%2Fava%2Fright.webp&w=640&q=100)
![ava](https://artisan.co/assets/ava.svg)
Hey there üëã I‚Äôm Ava
## Meet Our First Artisan, 
## Ava, the AI BDR
[Meet Ava](https://artisan.co/</ai-sales-agent>)[Talk to Sales](https://artisan.co/</talk-to-sales?page_source=/>)
She Automates Outbound
Ava automates 80% of the work your outbound team are doing manually within our all-in-one platform.
She Finds Leads
Ava prospects for you with access to over 300M enriched B2B leads. She can also scrape the web for relevant intent signals, such as fundraising announcements and hiring news.
She Prospects With Emails & LinkedIn
Using our Personalization Waterfall, Ava identifies the optimal personalization approach for each lead. She can reference social media posts, website searches, job changes, and much more.
![play](https://artisan.co/assets/platform-overview/play-btn.svg)
How Artisan Sales Works
## Get Better Outbound Sales Results
## With Less Human Work
1
## Create A Campaign
With campaigns, you decide who Ava targets, what she's pitching, and what messaging & language she targets them with.
[Talk to Sales](https://artisan.co/</talk-to-sales?page_source=/>)
2
## Ava Finds You Leads
Ava identifies leads that match your targeting criteria with her international B2B database that has over 300M contacts in over 200 countries.
[Talk to Sales](https://artisan.co/</talk-to-sales?page_source=/>)
3
## Ava Researches Leads
Ava scrapes the web and her database for relevant intent signals, such as fundraising announcements, Google searches, and hiring news.
[Talk to Sales](https://artisan.co/</talk-to-sales?page_source=/>)
4
## Ava Ghostwrites Hyper-Personalized Emails
Using our Personalization Waterfall, Ava identifies the optimal personalization approach for each lead, referencing social media posts, website visits, and much more.
[Talk to Sales](https://artisan.co/</talk-to-sales?page_source=/>)

generated_description:
**Artisan: The AI Revolution in Outbound Sales**

Artisan is a forward-thinking company based in San Francisco that launched in 2023, emerging from the Y Combinator Batch W24. Their mission is to develop AI employees‚Äîdubbed *Artisans*‚Äîto streamline and enhance outbound sales processes. At the helm of this innovative venture is Ava, their AI Business Development Representative (BDR), ready to automate the labor-intensive aspects of outbound sales.

The platform offers a comprehensive suite designed for B2B sales. It includes:
- Access to a rich database of over 300 million B2B contacts
- AI-driven email sequences
- Advanced deliverability optimization tools

Ava is not just a passive assistant; she actively automates lead discovery and research. She scans multiple data sources to identify potential leads and craft personalized outreach, optimizing strategies based on the unique signals observed from each contact (think social media insights, job changes, and more). 

Artisan envisions itself as a game-changer in the software landscape, aiming to consolidate various SaaS applications into one powerful platform. This approach represents what they call the "next Industrial Revolution"‚Äîeliminating the clutter of numerous tools with a single, cohesive solution. 

With a team of 30, including notable Group Partner Pete Koomen, Artisan is positioning itself at the forefront of AI automation in sales. Their ultimate goal? To build a world where AI and humans collaborate seamlessly, driving sales efficiency and effectiveness. 

You can explore more about their offerings or even book a demo on their website: [Artisan](https://artisan.co/?utm_source=ycombinator).

**Key Takeaways:**
- Artisan specializes in creating AI-driven sales solutions through their platform.
- Their key feature, Ava, automates a significant portion of the outbound sales process, allowing sales teams to focus on higher-impact activities.
- They aim to consolidate multiple sales tools into one, simplifying the sales infrastructure for businesses.

In an age where efficiency is king, Artisan stands out as a beacon for businesses looking to optimize their sales strategies with cutting-edge technology.
